/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, with occasional splashes of red and green adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the image. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
